title.narrative: E-costermonger: improving conscious purchasing behaviour for sustainability

description.narrative: For the objective of the E-kofa (cca. E-costermonger) is to establish a direct producer-customer cooperation in order to enable customers to buy local eco-friendly products with warranty and provide a reliable marketing channel for farmersin Eger, Hungary. The project is expected to (1) build up confidence between local producers and consumers; (2) set up a direct trading scheme of local products; (3) disseminate eco-conscious local purchasing. Main activities and outputs include - evaluation and involvement of at least 20 farmers within a 30 mile radius of Eger; - at least 20 video presentations of the involved farmers; - the www.e-kofa.hu website dedicated to the dissemination of up-to-date information on farmers and products and to the online ordering system; - a media campaign on the local level. The project targets the inhabitants of Eger, local farmers of the city's vicinity, relevant local civil society organizations and other groups of citizens
